title: Collaborative Learning Group Formation and Management Training Using CLFP (Collaborative Learning Facilitation Protocol)

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Acquiring methods to form and manage collaborative learning groups in smartphone-based environments to strengthen mathematical problem-solving competencies.

learning_goals: Explain the four core principles of Collaborative Learning Flow Patterns (CLFP)
Form learning groups based on TAPPS/Jigsaw patterns for given mathematics problems
Reorganize groups using technical support when unexpected learning situations occur
Identify three or more problems arising during collaborative learning activities in mobile environments and propose solutions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
